text: Jack Mercer (January 13, 1910 - December 4, 1984) was an American movie, television, voice, and stage actor, storyman, and animator who is known for his voice role as Popeye. He was born in Worthington, Indiana on January 31, 1910. He was married to Margie Hines from 1939 to 1942. Then to Virginia Mercer until his death in 1984, he had no children. He died in Queens, New York from stomach cancer on December 4, 1984, he was 74 years old.New York Times Obituary, 9 December 1984. Last retrieved 12 March 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Biography --"He Am What He Am!--Jack Mercer, the Voice of Popeye" by Fred M. title: Jack Mercer
